name: final-fantasy-7-script
description: Processing the Japanese and English Final Fantasy 7 script for quick and easy use.

scripts.kanji: cd src && node generate-kanji-table -q && node generate-kanji-order -q && node generate-kanji-readme -q
scripts.meta: npm run kanji && npm run split && npm run table && npm run anki
scripts.cycle-all: npm run process && npm run meta
scripts.cycle-scenes: npm run process && npm run split && npm run table
